resources.string: If you are on 3G/4G/LTE unfortunately you can not use Smart DNS Proxy. You have to be connected to a Wireless network.

This is an android client application for the www.smartdnsproxy.com service. You will be able to select the primary and secondary DNS servers and also trigger the IP update automatically at connection time. To trigger the IP update you will need to obtain the service id associated with your account from https://www.smartdnsproxy.com/MyAccount/API
